page.title: 02WHERE ARE WE ? (ONE)
page.content: The area covers the two counties of Warwickshire and Leicestershire.A rural area,centres of{population}being Warton with Little Warton in the county of Warwickshire and Orton-on-the-hill with Little Orton in the county of Leicestershire.The remainder of the population living in outlying farms and small holdings.The two villages are totally different in character.Warton has two distinct { {life styles.}One,the old village of local workers and the other of the modern commuter.Orton is a tiny, sprawling village,{ancient}buildings, village green,a closely knit community of mainly retired people and farmers. Both villages sit on a hill,the { {landscape}in between being a broad, flat valley where the ancient hedgerows and trees have been removed.
